Roll and enjoy an Italian mainstay with a multi-generational local family.

If you’re currently unable to travel to Italy don’t worry: Italy will come to you! Nonna will cook live in your home! Grab your laptop, buy the ingredients and be ready to prepare your handmade pasta with grandma through a live streaming from Palombara.

Price

Free
Location

Lekki, Lagos

Another Info

You can only view the exact location and/or link when you join the activity. Your host will be notified of your attendance.

Your Host

Name Info

Hi there, My name is Ingrid, I am French girl and one of the thing, I grew-up with and I miss the most from Nigeria and Lagos specifically.
